title: Lowest Average Precipitation
description: In 2021, Egypt had one of the lowest average precipitation depths in the world, with only 18.1 mm of rainfall per year.

title: Highest Freshwater Withdrawals
description: In 2021, Egypt's annual freshwater withdrawals were 7750% of its internal resources, one of the highest rates globally.

title: Perfect Female Education Persistence
description: In 2020, Egypt achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching grade 5 and the last grade of primary school, indicating strong educational retention for girls.

title: Highest Tariff Rate on Primary Products
description: In 2019, Egypt applied a simple mean tariff rate of 99.4% on primary products, one of the highest in the world.
